name: zsm-timetable
description: App for more futuristic preview of timetables for Zesół Szkół Mechanicznych w Rzeszowie

scripts.build:school: vite build && rm zsm-timetable.tar.gz -f && tar --exclude='plan_vulcan' -czvf zsm-timetable.tar.gz dist/
scripts.update: npm i @vueuse/core@latest @vueuse/router@latest axios@latest bootstrap@latest chroma-js@latest pinia@latest string-to-color@latest vue@latest vue-router@latest
scripts.update:dev: npm i -D @vitejs/plugin-vue@latest autoprefixer@latest postcss@latest sass@latest terser@latest unplugin-auto-import@latest unplugin-vue-components@latest vite@latest vite-plugin-banner@latest vite-plugin-pwa@latest
